endpoints.description: Allows new participants to register for the energy trading platform by providing necessary details for authentication and compliance verification.
A secure endpoint for participants to authenticate and access the trading platform services after registration.
Fetches real-time market data, including spot and forward prices crucial for making informed trading decisions.
Facilitates the execution of trade between participants by submitting a detailed trade request. Requires compliance with specified criteria.
Returns the current status and history of trades executed by the participant, aiding in monitoring and review.
Allows participants to create, amend, or settle contracts digitally, providing a streamlined process for contract management.
Provides access to advanced risk assessment tools that evaluate potential exposures, helping participants mitigate risks effectively.
Retrieves a detailed audit trail of all past transactions, ensuring transparency and aiding in regulatory compliance.
Enables participants to update their trading preferences and settings, including notification preferences and risk thresholds.
Generates comprehensive compliance reports tailored for regional energy trading standards to aid participants in meeting legal requirements.
